Title: Run Windows Shell Commands
Description:
This is a simple WPF Application that run Windows Shell commands like the well knonw "shell:sendto".

Currently supported operating systems are Windows 2000, Windows XP, Windows Vista and Windows 7.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
This is a simple WPF Application that run Windows Shell commands like the well knonw "shell:sendto".

Currently supported operating systems are Windows 2000, Windows XP, Windows Vista and Windows 7.

Each command is read from the registry, in Vista and Windows 7 they are located at "HKLM\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Explorer\FolderDescriptions".
